sn47.7:4.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa duggā visamā desā, yattha neva makkaṭānaṃ cārī na manussānaṃ.
sn47.7:4.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa duggā visamā desā, yattha makkaṭānañhi kho cārī, na manussānaṃ.
sn47.7:4.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa samā bhūmibhāgā ramaṇīyā, yattha makkaṭānañceva cārī manussānañca.
sn47.7:4.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, luddā makkaṭavīthīsu lepaṃ oḍḍenti makkaṭānaṃ bādhanāya.
sn47.7:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te makkaṭā abālajātikā alolajātikā, te taṃ lepaṃ disvā ārakā parivajjanti.
sn47.7:5.2: Yo pana so hoti makkaṭo bālajātiko lolajātiko, so taṃ lepaṃ upasaṅkamitvā hatthena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:5.8: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pādañcā’ti dutiyena pādena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:5.10: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pāde cā’ti tuṇḍena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:5.12: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, makkaṭo pañcoḍḍito thunaṃ seti anayaṃ āpanno byasanaṃ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo luddassa.
sn47.7:5.13: Tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, luddo vijjhitvā tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhakataṅgāre avassajjetvā yena kāmaṃ pakkamati.
sn47.7:5.14: Evaṃ so taṃ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.7:6.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave,* mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.7:6.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṃ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ.
sn47.7:6.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.7:6.7: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā … pe …
sn47.7:6.10: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn47.7:7.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.7:7.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṃ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ.
sn47.7:7.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.7:7.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.7:7.10: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.7:7.11: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
